text: Fiji Water is a brand that manufactures bottled water, it is shipped and bottled in Yaqara Valley on the island of Viti Levu in Fiji. The company was founded by David Gilmour in 1996. Fiji water comes from an underground artesian aquifer, a naturally formed chamber of volcanic rock that is protected by layers of rock that limit contamination. == References == Category:Drinking water Category:Fiji
title: Fiji Water
